summary: REQ-21 and REQ-22 appear implemented via a new global fixed cash-themed gradient background applied to the body (light/dark variants) and an updated HeroBranding overlay using the existing cash pattern asset with stronger opacity and green/gold gradients. AppLayout now enforces full-viewport height via min-h-screen. There are also some additional, unrequested landing-page visual tweaks (card borders/icons).

hallucinated_features.description: Additional landing page styling updates to feature cards (cash-gold borders/hover states and icon color tweaks) beyond the requested hero/background adjustments.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked for global AppLayout background treatment and landing hero pattern/gradient integration; it did not request changing card border colors/hover styling or icon coloring in other landing sections.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduction of custom cash-themed utility classes (text/bg/border/fill cash green/gold) beyond the explicitly requested background/hero changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: The request focuses on global background and hero background treatment; adding a broader utility palette is not explicitly requested (though it may support the theme work).
